document.heading: Winter Sidewalk Safety Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-211, the “Winter Sidewalk Safety Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-715. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 28, 2014, and Nov. 18, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 12, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-515 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-211 became effective on Mar. 11, 2015.
